## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G42000](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G42000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtORM2, ORM2</u>
- **Gene Name:** Orosomucoid-like 2
- **Description:**   ORMDL family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
